text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" FHD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce RTX 2060, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DV-PB74 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" FHD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce RTX 2060, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DV-PB74!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" FHD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce RTX 2060, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DV-PB74 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" FHD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce RTX 2060, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DV-PB74 is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" FHD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 7 R7-3750H, GeForce RTX 2060, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DV-PB74!
